name: db-astro-suite
description: A suite of Astro tools with Python backends and Go generators.

scripts.build: pnpm -r exec rm -rf dist && rm -rf dist && pnpm build:hub && pnpm build:starwizz && pnpm build:astrogram && pnpm build:merge
scripts.build:merge: mkdir -p dist/starwizz dist/astrogram && (cp -rf hub/dist/analog/public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || cp -rf hub/dist/client/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -rf tools/starwizz/dist/starwizz/browser/* dist/starwizz/ 2>/dev/null || cp -rf tools/starwizz/dist/starwizz/* dist/starwizz/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -rf tools/astrogram/dist/astrogram/browser/* dist/astrogram/ 2>/dev/null || cp -rf tools/astrogram/dist/astrogram/* dist/astrogram/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp dist/index.html dist/404.html 2>/dev/null || true)
